title: Farming Documentary: Harvesting and Processing Billions of Tons of Sugarcane in the U S

subtasks: Operating land preparation machine (plowing, weeding, tilling)
Using modern planting machine to place seeds/cuttings into soil
Applying fertilizers
Operating advanced machinery for precision weeding
Using soil cultivators to improve soil conditions
Utilizing modern sugarcane harvesters (rotating blades, leaf strippers, sensors)
Loading onto specialized transport vehicles
Ensuring the freshness of the cane during transportation.
Crushing the sugarcane using high-tech machines.
Clarifying and filtering the extracted juice.
Concentrating the juce through evaporation.
Crystallization and separation using advanced machinery.
Utilizing by-products (bagasse, molasses) for biofuel and other applications.
